action_output_list: The user wants to change the language of the Retro Music app to Vietnamese. To do this, I need to open the app first.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music Player"}
To change the language, I need to find the settings option in the app. The settings icon is visible on the screen.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}

The current screen displays the settings of the Retro Music app. To find the language settings, I need to scroll down the screen to see if the option is available.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 8}
